com.ibm.watson.developer_cloud.speech_to_text.v1.model

Class Corpus

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ibm.watson.developer_cloud.service.model.GenericModel
      • com.ibm.watson.developer_cloud.speech_to_text.v1.model.Corpus

  • public class Corpus
extends GenericModel
    Customization corpus. The information includes the total number of words and out-of-vocabulary (OOV) words, name, and status of each corpus. Only the owner of a custom model can use this method to list the model's corpora.
